sn44.3:1.1: Ekam samayam ayasma ca sariputto, ayasma ca mahakotthiko baranasiyam viharanti isipatane migadaye.
sn44.3:1.2: Atha kho ayasma mahakotthiko sayanhasamayam patisallana vutthito yenayasma sariputto tenupasankami; upasankamitva ayasmata sariputtena saddhim sammodi.
sn44.3:1.3: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma mahakotthiko ayasmantam sariputtam etadavoca:
sn44.3:2.1: “Kim nu kho, avuso sariputta, hoti tathagato param marana”ti?
sn44.3:2.4: “Kim panavuso, na hoti tathagato param marana”ti?
sn44.3:2.7: “Kim nu kho, avuso, hoti ca na ca hoti tathagato param marana”ti?
sn44.3:2.9: ‘hoti ca na ca hoti tathagato param marana’”ti.
sn44.3:2.10: “Kim panavuso, neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana”ti?
sn44.3:2.12: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana’”ti.
sn44.3:3.1: “‘Kim nu kho, avuso, hoti tathagato param marana’ti iti puttho samano, ‘abyakatam kho etam, avuso, bhagavata—
sn44.3:3.3: ‘kim panavuso, neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana’ti iti puttho samano:
sn44.3:3.5: neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana’ti vadesi.
sn44.3:3.6: Ko nu kho, avuso, hetu, ko paccayo yenetam abyakatam bhagavata”ti?
sn44.3:4.1: “Hoti tathagato param maranati kho, avuso, rupagatametam.
sn44.3:4.2: Na hoti tathagato param maranati, rupagatametam.
sn44.3:4.3: Hoti ca na ca hoti tathagato param maranati, rupagatametam.
sn44.3:4.4: Neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param maranati, rupagatametam.
sn44.3:4.5: Hoti tathagato param maranati kho, avuso, vedanagatametam.
sn44.3:4.6: Na hoti tathagato param maranati, vedanagatametam.
sn44.3:4.7: Hoti ca na ca hoti tathagato param maranati, vedanagatametam.
sn44.3:4.8: Neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param maranati, vedanagatametam.
sn44.3:4.9: Hoti tathagato param maranati kho, avuso, sannagatametam.
sn44.3:4.10: Na hoti tathagato param maranati, sannagatametam.
sn44.3:4.11: Hoti ca na ca hoti tathagato param maranati, sannagatametam.
sn44.3:4.12: Neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param maranati, sannagatametam.
sn44.3:4.13: Hoti tathagato param maranati kho, avuso, sankharagatametam.
sn44.3:4.14: Na hoti tathagato param maranati, sankharagatametam.
sn44.3:4.15: Hoti ca na ca hoti tathagato param maranati, sankharagatametam.
sn44.3:4.16: Neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param maranati, sankharagatametam.
sn44.3:4.17: Hoti tathagato param maranati kho, avuso, vinnanagatametam.
sn44.3:4.18: Na hoti tathagato param maranati, vinnanagatametam.
sn44.3:4.19: Hoti ca na ca hoti tathagato param maranati, vinnanagatametam.
sn44.3:4.20: Neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param maranati, vinnanagatametam.
sn44.3:4.21: Ayam kho, avuso, hetu ayam paccayo, yenetam abyakatam bhagavata”ti.
